t: Our Brand Story – Michael Graves Design
s: Before Target, the Michael Graves company provided design consulting services for other brands like Alessi, Disney, and Lenox, and those clients marketed the products as designed by Michael Graves. But at Target, the products were branded Michael Graves Design, and our business transformed ...

The Michael Graves Design brand at Target was the first example of an architect/designer having his own consumer brand of products. As such, the products, packaging and all branded elements had to represent the architectural perspective and establish Michael Graves in the consumer mind.
Meet the designers and leaders at Michael Graves.
